title: A Really Specific Investigator That Finds Out How Many Characters Your Role Has And Also Happens To Be A Rock

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Check someone, and find out how many characters their role has (as written in <#970046125065265202>).

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You are a rock
- You can use your ability in addition to the factional Rock kill.
